title: Analyzing Factors Influencing Mobile Learning Adoption for Prospective Teachers Aged 40+

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Digital devices provided, operated for pre-service teachers/teachers in social studies fields, with formative assessment-centered operations

learning_goals: Analyze and explain factors influencing m-learning adoption (relative utility, complexity, social influence, etc.)
Conduct learner needs analysis by applying survey-based empirical research methodologies
Develop educational strategies reflecting the design preferences and concerns of learners aged 40+ in m-learning
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
